full_text: [Didn't make any announcement and just... started it ig  0/100 Days of UI]

Some simple sign up pages I may use for Grid. Unsure whether I want to go for images or something cleaner - still trying to figure out the visual brand.

Can't wait to code this and animate!

#001 / 100 
#DailyUI #100DaysOfCode https://t.co/QcLLjNC1hY

Not happy but progress > perfection. I can improve later. I initially tried a dark UI but it was looking crappy and... This is what happens when I don't plan the palette üòÖ

Stream chat chose the total üôÉ #nice

2 / 100 
#DailyUI #100DaysOfCode #100DaysOfDesign https://t.co/QusMA7kdg5

Okay, so this is version 3. The images are all placeholders until I can do custom graphics and mockups - too much for one day üôÉ This is p. much *one* step towards the atmosphere I want to end up with.

3 / 100 - Landing page
#DailyUI #100DaysOfCode #100DaysOfDesign https://t.co/9Nqm2qEsj4

My first neumorphic design. I made a small recipe calculator. I've always wanted to try the trend; I likely will only be making them for fun as I understand they're poorly accessible.

4 / 100 - Calculator
#DailyUI #100DaysOfCode #100DaysOfDesign https://t.co/0DpOsxColf

Fancy icons that look nice alone don't necessarily stand out among others. These stood out the most when I overlaid it onto my app drawer. If the aesthetic doesn't 100% match the others (flat) it stands out more, heh!

5 / 100 - App icon
#DailyUI 
#100DaysOfCode 
#100DaysOfDesign https://t.co/lXFXQZI7ua

Had a go at a simple user community profile. There are probs going to be more options for Grid, and different styles. I tried full glassmorphism but it wasn't working so added a little here and there. üò≠ Ah, well!

6 / 100 - User profile
#DailyUI 
#100DaysOfCode 
#100DaysOfDesign https://t.co/AJSkbOk5ro

Not a huge fan of the style but wanted to try something a bit different. The usual minimal layouts seem so much easier than ones that have more colourful elements on themüôÉ+ thanks for emo banter on stream!ü•∞

7 / 100 - Settings page
#DailyUI 
#100DaysOfCode 
#100DaysOfDesign https://t.co/5wEEVc8n3p

Not what I ultimately had in mind until I learn to do the sorts of 3D graphics I'd like for Grid to have, but it'll do. That's a whole different skillset. üôÉ

Progress > Perfection

Thanks Foo for the feedback <3

8 / 100 - 404 page
#DailyUI 
#100DaysOfCode
